title: Crushed pea and broad bean bruschetta

ingredients.item: 1 tbsp grated pecorino, plus extra to serve

instructions.step: Cook the peas and broad beans in boiling salted water for 3 minutes, then drain and refresh under cold running water. Tip into a bowl. Slip the broad beans from their skins and return the beans to the bowl. Mash very roughly using the back of a fork.

Pour in 4 tbsp oil, then stir in the lemon zest and juice, cheese, mint and chilli; season. Toast the bread; rub with the cut side of the garlic. Drizzle over the remaining 1 tbsp olive oil, then spoon over the crushed peas and beans; finish with a little more pecorino.
